record.description: Mr. Kwok Wai Lau shows some of his paintings to Mr. and Mrs. Jacobson at the 57th Street Art Fair.
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Scanned copy in box 2, folder 5 barcode # 44041170. Photographer stamp, handwritten date and caption from 2nd copy (more complete).
